bug.short_desc: NPE in DefaultValuePairBinding.<init> for annotation without arguments

long_desc.thetext: I think the javadoc should be clarified as what to expect for an array member value pair without a default value. Is it an empty array or an array with null in it ?

Which Javadoc? Note that we're operating out of spec here, since the code doesn't compile. I don't think we should specify recovery behavior.
BTW: An array with null in it doesn't make sense, since annotation element values cannot be null, and since it would be arbitrary to assume the array should contain 1 element. The only alternative would be to return null, but since we already know that it has to be an array, we can also return an array (=> one burden less for the client).
